title: Runaan's Hurricane Needs A Tweak
body:
This is strictly a visual change and not so much for balance, I'm not sure if there is a category for visual changes alone.

I believe the two bolts on {{item:3085}}  should be identical to the champions basic attack. I understand why they look the way they do and all that but from a personal opinion I think it would be much more visually pleasing if you got to see your champions basic attack 3x.

replies.body: I'm with you that the visual effect would generally look cooler, we do think it's important that the secondary shots from Runaan's are clearly distinguished from the primary shot though, so this is a case where clarity of gameplay has to trump aesthetics a bit unfortunately. The primary shot both deals more damage and applies some effects (such as Silver bolts) that the secondary shots don't, so we feel it's important it's clear which is which.
you could make them the same projectile but made of rainbows and unicorns?
